entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
